column4: Validate GitLab Premium server installation and startup
column6: 1. Install GitLab Omnibus; 2. Configure PostgreSQL; 3. Start services; 4. Verify admin console access
column7: GitLab admin console accessible with all services running

column4: Validate GitLab Runner registration on build servers
column6: 1. Install GitLab Runner; 2. Register with GitLab; 3. Configure executor; 4. Verify runner status
column7: 8 runners registered and active in GitLab admin

column4: Validate Docker Enterprise on all build agents
column6: 1. Install Docker; 2. Configure daemon; 3. Enable BuildKit; 4. Test container builds
column7: Docker operational on all 8 build servers

column4: Validate JFrog Artifactory Pro installation and repos
column6: 1. Install Artifactory; 2. Create Maven repo; 3. Create npm repo; 4. Create Docker registry
column7: All artifact repositories operational with 20TB storage

column4: Validate SSO login to GitLab via corporate IdP
column6: 1. Configure SAML provider; 2. Test user login; 3. Verify group mapping; 4. Check permissions
column7: 50 developers authenticate via SAML SSO

column4: Validate end-to-end CI/CD pipeline execution
column6: 1. Clone test repo; 2. Trigger pipeline; 3. Execute all stages; 4. Push artifacts
column7: Multi-stage pipeline completes with artifacts in Artifactory

column4: Validate Docker image builds and registry push
column6: 1. Build Docker image; 2. Tag image; 3. Push to registry; 4. Verify in Artifactory
column7: Docker images stored in JFrog Docker registry

column4: Validate pipeline migration from Jenkins to GitLab
column6: 1. Convert Jenkinsfile to gitlab-ci; 2. Test equivalent; 3. Validate outputs; 4. Compare results
column7: Migrated pipelines produce identical artifacts

column4: Description
column6: Test Steps

column4: Validate system handles 5000 builds per day capacity
column6: 1. Generate build load; 2. Monitor throughput; 3. Measure queue times; 4. Check resource usage
column7: 5000+ builds processed per day with <5 min queue time

column4: Validate 24 concurrent build execution capacity
column6: 1. Trigger 24 parallel builds; 2. Monitor CPU memory; 3. Check completion times; 4. Verify no failures
column7: 24 concurrent builds complete without resource exhaustion

column4: Validate 20TB artifact storage and retrieval speed
column6: 1. Store 100GB test artifacts; 2. Measure upload speed; 3. Test retrieval; 4. Verify integrity
column7: Artifact operations achieve 500MB/s+ throughput

column4: Validate job redistribution on runner failure
column6: 1. Disable one runner; 2. Trigger builds; 3. Verify redistribution; 4. Check completion
column7: Jobs automatically redistribute to available runners

column4: Validate Docker image vulnerability scanning
column6: 1. Push test image; 2. Trigger scan; 3. Review vulnerabilities; 4. Verify policy enforcement
column7: Vulnerability scanning identifies CVEs before deployment

column4: Validate secure credential storage in GitLab
column6: 1. Store secrets; 2. Reference in pipeline; 3. Verify masking; 4. Check audit logs
column7: Secrets masked in logs and securely injected

column4: Validate complete audit logging for compliance
column6: 1. Execute builds; 2. Review audit logs; 3. Verify user actions; 4. Test log retention
column7: All CI/CD activities logged with user attribution

column4: Validate artifact retention policies per compliance
column6: 1. Set retention policy; 2. Wait expiration; 3. Verify cleanup; 4. Check protected artifacts
column7: Artifacts retained per policy with automatic cleanup
